summary: A simple, esp-less Conjuration staff model replacer with some custom textures and a pulsating glow effect.
descriptionHtml:
[center]﻿[/center][center][size=4]﻿This mod replaces the [b]Conjuration staff[/b] model which uses the [b]Daedric Battleaxe textures[/b].

[/size][size=4]The staff's overall appearance [i](except for the orb)[/i] will depend on the installed textures for your Daedric Battleaxe.

[/size][i][size=3]The in-game screenshot uses the vanilla textures.

[/size][/i][/center][center]
[size=4]The orb uses its own separate textures which is included in the file. It has a red pulsating glow effect added to it.



DSR Patch also included with the modded files.[/size][/center]

My other weapon mods:

[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/92118][img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/images/110/10838763-1530264673.png[/img][/url]﻿
